p: All extracts exhibited potent inhibitory activity on α-glucosidase. The IC 50 values are statistically lower than that of the reference inhibitor, ranging from 0.53 ± 0.014 to 1.63 ± 0.23 µg/mL. In particular, the α-glucosidase inhibitory activity of the MEG was found to be ∼170 times more active than acarbose.
